short_summary: Analyzing pricing and contract details for Hypalon inflatable tubes and other marine-related products
description: The contract is for the supply of Hypalon inflatable tubes and other associated products used in the marine industry. Increased material costs, changes in demand, and contract terms may affect contract award prices and contract value!
full_summary:
=====================================

> **Title (English/French):** Hypalon Inflatable Tubes/Tubes gonflables Hypalon
================================
        
> **Tender Reference/Numéro de référence:** WS3660256729-Doc3660418080
========================================

**Prospectus/Tender Announcement**
---------------------------------

### Summary/Résumé

A government contract notice for Hypalon inflatable tubes/tubes gonflables Hypalon for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) /Gendarmerie royale du Canada (GRC).

### Tender Details/Détails de l'appel d'offres

*   **Procurement Category/Catégorie d'approvisionnement**: GD
*   **United Nations Standard Products and Services Code/ Code des produits et services des Nations unies (CPSU)**: 25111900 (Marine craft systems and subassemblies/Systèmes et sous-ensembles pour embarcations)
*   **Publication Date Date de publication**: September 12, 2022
*   **Closing Date (Updated)/Date de clôture (mise à jour)**: September 28, 2022, 14:00 EDT

### Tender Requirements/Exigences de l'appel d'offres

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on September 28, 2022, before 14:00 EDT. Late submissions will not be accepted.

### Tender Contact/Coordonnateur de l'appel d'offres

*   **Name/Nom**: Liao, Guo (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email Adresse courriel**: guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL/URL de l'avis**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14078835?extsite=MTQwNzg4MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### About the Contract/Information sur le contrat

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit tenders for Hypalon inflatable tubes/tubes gonflables Hypalon on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) /Gendarmerie royale du Canada (GRC).

Please note that this is an **Advance Contract Award Notice** and the bid has expired. If you wish to access the document, please follow this URL: <http://discovery
